briefTitle: Pilot Functional Imaging Study to Evaluate Mechanisms Underlying Chronic Pain in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Pilot Functional Imaging Study to Evaluate Mechanisms Underlying Chronic Pain in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Determination of differences in pain sensitivity and functional MRI in different groups of patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast Cancer Survivor with and without chronic pain
* Able to undergo MRI
